entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
